Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class BoardAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.BoardAnalyzer

  • public class BoardAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to analyze a Player's Board. Its methods calculate the Player's score related to his PrivateObjectiveCard and to the PublicObjectiveCards
    Author:
    Matteo Gagliano

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int countColorDiagonals​()
      Tells how many diagonals of a color are present in the Board.
      int countColumns​(boolean type)
      If type is color, it tells how many columns have all the possible colors.
      int countRows​(boolean type)

      If type is color, it tells how many sets of different color are on the Board.

      Tells how many sets of two values (val1,val2) are in the Board.

    • Method Detail

      • countSets

        public int countSets​(int val1,
                     int val2)
        Tells how many sets of two values (val1,val2) are in the Board. It counts how many val1 and val2 are on the Board and then returns the minimum of the counters.
        Parameters:
        val1 - first element to count
        val2 - second element to count
        Returns:
        total number of sets of (val1,val2)

      • countSets

        public int countSets​(boolean type)
        If type is color, it tells how many sets of different color are on the Board. If type is value, it tells how many sets of different values are on the Board. A set is counted only if it has all the possible values or colors.
        Parameters:
        type - is used to choose between colors or values
        Returns:
        the number of sets of different colors or values

      • countRows

        public int countRows​(boolean type)
        If type is color, it tells how many rows have all the possible colors. If type is value, it tells how many rows have all the possible values.
        Parameters:
        type - is used to choose between values or colors
        Returns:
        the number of rows with no repeated values or colors

      • countColumns

        public int countColumns​(boolean type)
        If type is color, it tells how many columns have all the possible colors. If type is value, it tells how many columns have all the possible values.
        Parameters:
        type - is used to choose between values or colors
        Returns:
        the number of columns with no repeated values or colors

      • countColorDiagonals

        public int countColorDiagonals​()
        Tells how many diagonals of a color are present in the Board. A diagonal is counted if two dice are adjacent diagonally and have the same color
        Returns:
        number of colored diagonals

      • sumValuesOfColor

        public int sumValuesOfColor​(Color color)
        Sums all the dice of a color passed by parameter that have been placed on the Board
        Parameters:
        color - is used to select the color of the dice to count
        Returns:
        the sum of the values of the dice with the color passed by argument
